Info.Title: Belle & Sebastian
Info.Writer: Juliette Sales (screenplay), Fabien Suarez (screenplay), Nicolas Vanier (screenplay), Cécile Aubry (original characters)
Info.Actors: Félix Bossuet, Tchéky Karyo, Margaux Chatelier, Dimitri Storoge
Info.Plot: A six-year-old boy and his dog look to foil a Nazi effort to capture French Resistance fighters.
